keywords.hello: Hello, {name}! To process further, you may type 'help' to know more about the keywords
keywords.help: You can type what you would like to ask such as fees, location, courses and all
keywords.library: The library is open till 7am to 6pm for all students. A perfect place to focus
keywords.courses: We offer a variety of courses, {name}. Check our website www.PoppletonUniversity.com for the full list!
keywords.sports: The sports center is open from 6 AM to 10 PM. Best place to break a sweat, {name}!
keywords.fees: The fees structure ranges from 10 lakh to 20 lakh depending on the courses you picked
keywords.alumni: Many of the student who graudated from here have a wonderful lifestyle
keywords.location: We are currently located at the Thaphathali, Kathmandu
keywords.labs: The labs here are all well maintained and up to date with the current technological features
keywords.schedule: The campus schedule is available online. Let me know if you need specific timings, {name}.
keywords.events: There are lots of exciting events this semester, {name}! Stay tuned for updates.
keywords.food: The cafeteria serves delicious meals from 7 AM to 9 PM. Hungry yet, {name}?
keywords.fun: We have game rooms, arcade and ECA courts to enjoy and energize
keywords.wifi: WiFi issues, {name}? Try reconnecting or head to the IT support team
keywords.friends: Spending time with friends is priceless, {name}. Treasure every moment!
keywords.admission: To apply for admission, {name}, please visit our website at www.PoppletonUniversity.com and fill out the application form. Make sure you meet the eligibility criteria!
keywords.campus tour: We conduct campus tours every Friday at 10 AM, {name}. You can sign up for one through the admissions office
keywords.hostel: The hostel is located near the campus, {name}. You can contact the hostel office for more details on rooms and availability
keywords.career services: Our career services help with internships, job placement, and resume building, {name}. Visit the Career Center for more details
keywords.graduation: For graduation details, {name}, please contact the academic office. They'll provide you with information on requirements and dates
keywords.student id: Your student ID is required for accessing campus services. You can collect it from the student office once you've registered, {name}
keywords.class schedule: You can find your class schedule on the student portal, {name}. If you have trouble, the academic office can assist you
keywords.tuition deadline: The tuition fees are due at the start of each semester, {name}. Please check the academic calendar for the exact deadline
keywords.online courses: Yes, {name}, we offer online courses. You can find them listed on the course catalog on the university website
keywords.attendance: Your attendance is tracked through the student portal, {name}. If you need an attendance certificate, please contact your department
keywords.student groups: We have several student groups, {name}, ranging from academic clubs to social and cultural activities. Feel free to join any that interest you!
keywords.sports facility: Our sports center is open from 6 AM to 10 PM, {name}. You can access it for various sports and fitness activities
keywords.counseling: If you need counseling or mental health support, {name}, please contact the counseling office. They offer both in-person and online services
keywords.transportation: We offer transportation services to and from campus, {name}. You can check the bus schedule on the student portal
keywords.student events: We host many student events throughout the year, {name}. Check the events section on the student portal for updates
keywords.faculty: You can find faculty contact details and office hours on the faculty section of the university website, {name}
keywords.research opportunities: If you're interested in research, {name}, check with your department for available opportunities and grants
keywords.parttime jobs: The campus also offers part-time job opportunities for students, {name}. You can find listings on the student job portal
keywords.internships: For internship opportunities, {name}, please visit the career center or check the student job portal for available positions
keywords.class reschedule: If a class is rescheduled, {name}, you'll be notified via email and the student portal. Be sure to check regularly
keywords.faculty office_hours: Each faculty member has specific office hours, {name}. You can find their availability on the department's page on the website
keywords.final exams: Final exams are typically held at the end of each semester, {name}. You can find the exam schedule on the student portal
keywords.course registration: Course registration opens a few weeks before each semester, {name}. You'll be notified via email with detailed instructions
keywords.course drop: If you need to drop a course, {name}, please visit the academic office or use the student portal before the deadline
keywords.transcript: To request your academic transcript, {name}, please contact the registrar's office. You can also request it through the student portal
keywords.contact admissions: If you have any admission-related queries, {name}, you can contact the admissions office at admissions@poppletonuniversity.com
keywords.student email: You can access your student email through the university portal, {name}. All important notices will be sent there

jokes: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs!
How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb? None. Thats a hardware problem.
Why don't skeletons fight each other? They dont have the guts!
What did the ocean say to the beach? Nothing, it just waved.
Why was the equal sign so humble? Because it knew it wasnt less than or greater than anyone else!
Why was six afraid of seven? Because seven eight nine.
Why don't elephants use computers? They're afraid of the mouse!
What do you call a bear with no teeth? A gummy bear!
How does a computer get drunk? It takes screenshots!
Why did the developer break up with their partner? They had too many conflicts!
Why was the JavaScript developer sad? Because they didn't know how to 'null' their feelings.
Why do cows have hooves instead of feet? Because they lactose!
What's a ghost's favorite food? Boo-berries!
Why don't oysters donate to charity? Because they're shellfish!
Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
random_responses: That's interesting! Can you tell me more, {name}?
I'm not sure about that, {name}. Could you clarify?
Hmm, let me think about it, {name}.
Oh, I hadn't thought of it that way, {name}
Hmm, let me check on that for you, {name}
That's beyond my expertise, but I can learn more, {name}!
That's a new one for me, {name}. Let me process that
I'm here for you, {name}. Keep sharing!
